interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: seedling Heated Eye Mask for Dry Eyes, Eye Compress Moist Heat, Silk sleep mask for dry eye relief, Plant Extract Warm Compress for Eyes, Stye Eye Therapy Mask (Blue)
Review Date: 2022/08/31
Store: Seedling
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Seedling', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'M', 'Manufacturer': 'seedling', 'Country of Origin': 'China'}
Review Text: I have trouble every so often with my tear ducts clogging. If you’ve ever had them clogged before than you know the discomfort that comes with it. I’ve actually had a tube put in my right tear duct to clear a blockage and that is dreadful to go through. It has been recommended that I use warm/hot (not scolding) compress to help keep my tear ducts draining. I’m trying this mask to save time. It’s easier than standing at the sink and constantly warming up a wash cloths with the faucet. It’s definitely relaxing and I can feel how it is going to help me. I wear eye mask when I sleep so I’m already used to having a cover over my eyes.
Review Title: Recommended to prevent my tear ducts clogging again👍⭐️
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Everyday Beauty Glow Day Cream, Gel-to-Oil Rich Moisturizer to Minimize Signs of Aging, Reduce Redness, Dullness, and Fatigue for a Healthy Glow, 1 oz. Jar Everyday Beauty {'Brand': 'Everyday Beauty', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.52 x 1.93 inches; 4.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '700463002381', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmetic Solutions, LLC'} I really like the feel of gel moisturizers when they go onto my face. There’s something about them that is super absorbent, yet extremely moisturizing. This particular cream/gel is exactly the same way. Did not leave a sticky/greasy feel/look at all on my face, it actually absorbed very quickly. It has a slight fragrant smell, nothing too extreme and it is did not irritate my skin at all. I have very sensitive skin and have to be careful about which products I use. It’s kept my face completely moisturized & glowing throughout the day.
My ONLY Issue with this product is the price. It’s a bit much for something that I need to use twice daily.
DISCLAIMER:
📝Yes, I am a VINE 🗣VOICE member. EVERY product that I review was selected by ME & ONLY ME. The product or item is ALWAYS something that is needed and will be used in my Home🏡 & Yard 🌱🍃, or for my FAMILY 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦& Pets🦮🐾🐈‍⬛, or JUST FOR ME 💁🏻‍♀️. If you’ve ever had them clogged before than you know the discomfort that comes with it. I’ve actually had a tube put in my right tear duct to clear a blockage and that is dreadful to go through. It has been recommended that I use warm/hot (not scolding) compress to help keep my tear ducts draining. I’m trying this mask to save time. It’s easier than standing at the sink and constantly warming up a wash cloths with the faucet. It’s definitely relaxing and I can feel how it is going to help me. I wear eye mask when I sleep so I’m already used to having a cover over my eyes. Recommended to prevent my tear ducts clogging again👍⭐️
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Focus on gel-based moisturizers for facial skincare, along with interest in eye care solutions.
- **Skin Type Sensitivity:** Prioritizes products that are suitable for sensitive skin, avoiding anything irritating.
- **Aesthetic Feel:** Enjoys non-greasy, quick-absorbing formulas that maintain skin hydration and a healthy glow, extending this preference to soothing eye care products.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Prefers mild scents, particularly those that are not overpowering.
- **Price Sensitivity:** Concerned about product pricing; seeks value for regular usage while exhibiting a willingness to invest in effective solutions for specific needs.
- **Engagement with Products:** Actively participates in reviews as a VINE member, sharing insights on both skincare and other health-related products for personal and family needs.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Generally enjoys the products, providing critical feedback regarding cost versus frequent use. Recently emphasized the importance of comfort and utility in care solutions.
- **Value for Quality:** Values product effectiveness and experience over just affordability, particularly in achieving immediate relief and long-term benefits.

This profile indicates a discerning user who not only seeks quality skincare, but is also proactive about overall eye health, reflecting a holistic approach to personal care.
